passages.text: My doctor said my zinc levels were low. He told me to take zinc supplements. I took zinc supplements for three months but they had no effect. It turns out that I was taking zinc oxide which is not absorbed well. I switched to zinc citrate, which increased my zinc levels quite a bit!

passages.text: I started feeling shaky whenever I ate dessert. I went to the doctor, and got a blood test. The doctor told me that I had type 2 diabetes. I didn't want to take insulin, so I worked on a diet and exercise. 12 months later, my diabetes was managed entirely by diet.

passages.title: Sugar
passages.text: I started feeling shaky whenever I ate dessert. I went to the doctor, and got a blood test. The doctor told me that I had type 2 diabetes. I didn't want to take insulin, so I worked on a diet and exercise. 12 months later, my diabetes was managed entirely by diet.

passages.title: Nursing Home
passages.text: My brother's brother-in-law collapsed one day. He had post polio syndrome. He needed a tube in his stomach and a catheter to his bladder. He was in a nursing home for two months, but got released. He recently had the tube and catheter removed.

passages.title: Orange Cat
passages.text: We noticed our orange tabby, I was getting skinny. Worried about me, we took me to the vet's office. The vet was not sure why I was losing weight, and did a blood test. When the results came back, we found out Max had kidney failure. We put on a special diet and are back to normal weight.

passages.title: OD
passages.text: My sister-in-law's son was a heroin addict. He tried rehab but failed. He was taking methadone. In April of 2013, he overdosed on heroin and died. His mother is still in mourning.

passages.title: Warfarin
passages.text: I had a stroke a few years ago. I got Warfarin shots in the belly every day while in rehab. One day the rehab doctor pulled me in. He showed the nurse the bruises on my belly. He said the nurse was injecting Warfarin in the wrong way.

passages.title: Zinc Oxide
passages.text: My doctor said my zinc levels were low. He told me to take zinc supplements. I took zinc supplements for three months but they had no effect. It turns out that I was taking zinc oxide which is not absorbed well. I switched to zinc citrate, which increased my zinc levels quite a bit!

passages.title: Sugar
passages.text: I started feeling shaky whenever I ate dessert. I went to the doctor, and got a blood test. The doctor told me that I had type 2 diabetes. I didn't want to take insulin, so I worked on a diet and exercise. 12 months later, my diabetes was managed entirely by diet.

passages.title: Nursing Home
passages.text: My brother's brother-in-law collapsed one day. He had post polio syndrome. He needed a tube in his stomach and a catheter to his bladder. He was in a nursing home for two months, but got released. He recently had the tube and catheter removed.

passages.title: Kidneys
passages.text: My friend's back started hurting me. I went to urgent care. They said my kidneys were not functioning well. I went to my PC, an urologist, and a nephrologist. They are still running tests.

passages.title: Widow
passages.text: My sister-in-law lost her husband in 1984. They had been married for 11 years and had three kids. He was an alcoholic and suffered a heart attack that year. He did not heed his doctor and kept drinking. He died of a second heart attack a few months after the first.

passages.title: Cloth diapers
passages.text: I have a daycare in my home where I take care of 8 kids. Some of these children are infants that are in diapers. One family chooses to diaper their child in cloth diapers. I don't mind using them, but they are more work. I change the baby and then put the soiled diaper in a bag.

passages.title: Kidneys
passages.text: My friend's back started hurting me. I went to urgent care. They said my kidneys were not functioning well. I went to my PC, an urologist, and a nephrologist. They are still running tests.

passages.title: Widow
passages.text: My sister-in-law lost her husband in 1984. They had been married for 11 years and had three kids. He was an alcoholic and suffered a heart attack that year. He did not heed his doctor and kept drinking. He died of a second heart attack a few months after the first.

passages.title: CPAP Trouble
passages.text: A year or so ago I was diagnosed with sleep apnea. The sleep specialist I saw recommended a CPAP to help me sleep. It took a while to get used to you to the CPAP but it really helped me. However, after using it for a while, I got a bad respiratory infection. I learned to clean my CPAP regularly and sleep well every night.

passages.title: Ear Drum
passages.text: When I sneezed, my right ear started to burn. Although I didn't know what was happening, I went to my mom. They decided to go to the hospital. The doctor diagnosed me with inflamed ear inflammation. I also prescribed some medication to I.

passages.text: I started feeling shaky whenever I ate dessert. I went to the doctor, and got a blood test. The doctor told me that I had type 2 diabetes. I didn't want to take insulin, so I worked on a diet and exercise. 12 months later, my diabetes was managed entirely by diet.

passages.text: My doctor said my zinc levels were low. He told me to take zinc supplements. I took zinc supplements for three months but they had no effect. It turns out that I was taking zinc oxide which is not absorbed well. I switched to zinc citrate, which increased my zinc levels quite a bit!

passages.title: Sugar
passages.text: I started feeling shaky whenever I ate dessert. I went to the doctor, and got a blood test. The doctor told me that I had type 2 diabetes. I didn't want to take insulin, so I worked on a diet and exercise. 12 months later, my diabetes was managed entirely by diet.

passages.title: HHT is real.
passages.text: I suffer from a rare genetic disease called HHT. I warned my dentist that I needed to have antibiotics. The dentist had never heard of HHT so I wouldn't prescribe them. passages.title: Orange Cat
passages.text: We noticed our orange tabby, I was getting skinny. Worried about me, we took me to the vet's office. The vet was not sure why I was losing weight, and did a blood test.
